meanings.definition: A type of brandy produced in the Armagnac region of France.
meanings.sent1: At the party, they enjoyed sipping on the smooth armagnacs.
meanings.sent2: The cellar was filled with various armagnacs from different years.
meanings.sent3: The armagnacs in the bottles seemed to be whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a glass of effervescent armagnacs.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the aged armagnacs lingered in the air, enticing all who passed by.

meanings.definition: Plural form of armagnac, referring to multiple bottles or servings of the brandy.
meanings.sent1: The shelves were stocked with armagnacs of different vintages.
meanings.sent2: They ordered a round of armagnacs to celebrate the successful deal.
meanings.sent3: The armagnacs on the table clinked together like a cheerful toast.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the rich scent of the many armagnacs on display.
meanings.sent5: The collection of armagnacs sparkled like gems in the dimly lit room.
